raw_body: ADIKARIWATTAGE – Dr. LLOYD – Loving husband of Badra Lecamwasam (Retd. Teacher,​ M.M.V. Matugama),​ father of Thishan (Melbourne),​ Gayan (Royal Hospital,​ Wellawatte) and Varuna (University of Moratuwa),​ father-in-law of Nadeesha (nee Ileperuma,​ Melbourne),​ Himali (nee Senanayake),​ Attorney General’s Department and Nadeeshani (nee Walpita) Family Health Bureau. Cortege leaves residence 104A,​ Heenatiyangala Road,​ Nagoda,​ Kalutara for Cremation at Etawila Cemetery (Nagoda,​ Kalutara) on 12th July (Wednesday) at 4.00 p.m.042479
